abstract: Former NFL safety Darren Sharper pleads guilty to sexual assault charges in federal court in New Orleans; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: The former All-Pro safety Darren Sharper pleaded guilty Friday in federal court in New Orleans in connection with allegations that he drugged and assaulted women in four states.

headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Pro Football; Sharper Pleads Guilty

snippet: The former All-Pro safety Darren Sharper pleaded guilty Friday in federal court in New Orleans in connection with allegations that he drugged and assaulted women in four states.
